text: @piersmorgan have died "WITH" Covid-19 not! "FROM" Which is it piers? Show some real facts! Post mortem results? Sighed affidavits from Doctors/Specialists? That Covid was the 99.9% reason they died from this virus! Numbers Sh'numbers! You are just stirring the shit!
